snippet: Bahrain and the United Arab Emirates have changed plans and now want to play in the men’s world championships in Qatar.
abstract: Bahrain and United Arab Emirates reverse course, saying they now want to participate in the men's handball world championships in Qatar; had withdrawn in apparent boycott of Qatari support for Islamist groups.
lead_paragraph: Bahrain and the United Arab Emirates have changed plans and now want to play in the men’s world championships in Qatar.

headline.main: Two Nations Reverse Course on Boycott of Handball Championships
